summary: Two quarreling peasant families, who were forced to leave their lands after the war, are settled by accident on two neighbouring farms.
cast: Waclaw Kowalski|Wladyslaw Hancza|Zdzislaw Karczewski|Eliasz Kuziemski|Ilona Kusmierska|Jerzy Janeczek|Maria Zbyszewska|Aleksander Fogiel|Kazimierz Talarczyk|Witold Pyrkosz|Halina Buyno-Loza|Natalia Szymanska|Zygmunt Bielawski|Borys Borkowski|Adam Dzieszynski|Zdzislaw Kuzniar|Jan Lopuszniak|Ferdynand Matysik|Andrzej Mrozek|Barbara Rachwalska|Tadeusz Skorulski|Wladyslaw Dewoyno|Elzbieta Jagielska|Elzbieta Kepinska|Ryszard Kotys|Mieczyslaw Loza|Boleslaw Plotnicki|Jerzy Walczak
title: Sami swoi
